description: This file defines the GameStateRepository interface, which extends JpaRepository to manage persistence of GameState entities. It provides a method to find a game state by the associated room ID.

classes.name: GameStateRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for managing GameState entities with custom method to find by room ID.

methods.name: findByRoom_Id
methods.description: Retrieves an Optional containing the GameState associated with the given room ID.
